vehicles.description: Large white truck parked on the side of the road to the right of the ego car, taking up part of the lane and obstructing visibility ahead.
vehicles.explanation: The parked truck may cause the ego car to slow down or change lanes to avoid collision and maintain a clear view of the road ahead.

traffic signs.description: A rectangular blue sign with a white 'P' visible above the parked truck, indicating on-street parking is permitted.
traffic signs.explanation: The presence of this sign suggests the likelihood of encountering more parked vehicles along the road, thus the ego car should remain cautious.

barriers.description: Green guardrail running along the right side of the road, close to the parked truck.
barriers.explanation: The guardrail limits the space for the ego car to maneuver around the parked truck and indicates a boundary to the drivable road area.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there is a large white truck parked on the side of the road to the right of the ego car, taking up part of a lane and obstructing visibility ahead. This parked truck may cause the ego car to slow down or change lanes to avoid collision and maintain a clear view of the road ahead.

Above the parked truck, there is a rectangular blue sign with a white 'P' indicating that on-street parking is permitted. The presence of this sign suggests the likelihood of encountering more parked vehicles along the road, and thus the ego car should remain cautious.

Additionally, a green guardrail runs along the right side of the road, close to the parked truck. This guardrail limits the space for the ego car to maneuver around the parked truck and indicates a boundary to the drivable road area.

1.description and explanation: The object is a large, heavy construction vehicle typically used in roadwork or building projects. It appears to be partially obstructing the lane on the right. The presence of this vehicle indicates ongoing construction or maintenance work in the area. For the ego car, this means potentially slowed or halted traffic ahead. Drivers should prepare to reduce speed and possibly merge left or follow roadwork signage for safety and to navigate past the obstruction smoothly. Awareness of workers in the vicinity is also necessary to maintain safety protocols.

driving_suggestion: Maintain lane with cautious speed while passing the parked truck, be prepared to change lanes if visibility ahead becomes compromised or if there are indications of other road users crossing or entering the road. Check rear-view and side mirrors for safe lane change if necessary.
